controllers

Class GameboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GameboardController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InitialisableWithParameters, java.io.Serializable

    public class GameboardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InitialisableWithParameters, java.io.Serializable
    Controls the Gameboard, the game's progression and its associated GUI
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Joshua Murray, Jordy Martinson, Martin Samm, Fungwah Westley, Issi Ludwig, Joseph Omar, Aaron Davies
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
